text: kya aap ne nahi dekha ke Allah taâ€™ala asmaan se paani utaarta hai aur ose zameen ki sutho mein pahonchaata hai, phir osi ke zariye se muqtalif qism ki khetiyaa ugaata hai, phir wo khushk ho jaati hai aur aap unhe zardh rang dekhte hai, phir unhe reza reza kar deta hai, us mein aqal mandho ke liye bahuth zyaada nasihath hai
